-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Please see the README on GitHub at
--   <a>https://github.com/bronen/bitcask-hs#readme</a>
@package bitcask-hs
@version 0.1.0.0

module Entry
type Checksum = Word32
type Timestamp = Int64
type FieldSize = Int64
type Key = ByteString
type Value = ByteString
data Entry
Entry :: Checksum -> Timestamp -> FieldSize -> FieldSize -> Key -> Value -> Entry
nanosSinceEpoch :: IO Timestamp
buildEntry :: Timestamp -> Key -> Value -> Entry
getEntryLength :: Entry -> Int
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Entry.Entry
instance GHC.Show.Show Entry.Entry

module Caskfile
serialiseEntry :: Entry -> ByteString
deserialiseEntry :: Get Entry
listCaskFiles :: IO [FilePath]
getLastFileId :: IO Int
prependEntry :: Int -> Entry -> IO Entry
readEntry :: ByteString -> IO Entry
deserialiseWithOffset :: ByteString -> Int -> IO [(Int, Entry)]
readEntries :: FilePath -> IO [(Int, Entry)]

module Keydir
data KeydirEntry
KeydirEntry :: Checksum -> FieldSize -> Int -> Timestamp -> KeydirEntry
type Keydir = Map Key KeydirEntry
mapEntriesToKeydir :: [(Int, Entry)] -> Keydir
buildKeyDir :: IO Keydir
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Keydir.KeydirEntry
instance GHC.Show.Show Keydir.KeydirEntry
